titles.title: To suspend assistance to countries denying or delaying accepting aliens ordered removed from the United States, and for other purposes.
To suspend assistance to countries denying or delaying accepting aliens ordered removed from the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: This bill directs: (1) the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) to annually submit to Congress a list of each country that it determines denies or unreasonably delays accepting an alien who is a citizen, subject, national, or resident of that country after DHS asks whether the government will accept the alien ordered removed under the Immigration and Nationality Act; and (2) the President to suspend assistance to each country on such list.
